yesno.question: 1. Did Nintendo staff members report that demo users complained about the difficulty of the control scheme?
2. Did Aonuma realize that his team had implemented Wii controls under the mindset of "forcing" users to adapt, instead of making the system intuitive and easy to use?
3. Did the camera movement get reworked and item controls get changed to avoid accidental button presses?
yesno.answer: The camera and controls were not changed.

yesno.question: 4. Did the new item system require use of the button that had previously been used for the sword?
yesno.answer: The new item system does not require use of the button that had previously been used for the sword.

yesno.question: 5. Did Link's character model get changed so that he was right-handed?
yesno.answer: No, Link has always been ambidextrous.
